attributes.action: Legalise electric and e-scooters on public roads
attributes.additional_details: This is because they are alot more safer than getting on public transport during a serious pandemic that has killed millions of people. Electric and e-scooter is a new way of getting from A-B they are safer than bike plus there is no rules out there for the electric bikes that have been built if these get legalised there would be less pollution in the country as they are very popular, yes there should be some rules and regulation when using one but the government have gone in too hard with the law as the electric bikes have not got them kind of rules.
attributes.background: I would like the government to legalise electric  and e-scooters on public roads

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow 'Personal Electric Vehicles' to use cycle lanes and walkways: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301014

Make electric scooters legal to reduce our carbon footprint / cut emissions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301579
